ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityState
if widget.Entity == None: return
if widget.Entity.State != EntityState.Initialized: temItem = widget.Entity.VerificarPodeInserirItem()
if (temItem) : widget.View.Commands["ADICIONARITEM"].Visible = True widget.View.Commands["LIBERAR"].Visible = False else: widget.View.Commands["ADICIONARITEM"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["LIBERAR"].Visible = True
if widget.Entity["STATUS"].GetInt32() > 1: widget.View.Commands["ADICIONARITEM"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["LIBERAR"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["VISUALIZARMOVIMENTACAO"].Visible = True widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_CANCELAR"].Visible = False
else:
if (temItem) : widget.View.Commands["VISUALIZARMOVIMENTACAO"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = True else: widget.View.Commands["ADICIONARITEM"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["LIBERAR"].Visible = False
